attributes.action: TO  STOP SCOTTISH AND NORTH IRELAND UNIS  CHARGEING ENGLISH AND WELSH CITIZENS £9000 A YEAR  FOR  UNI  WHILE ACCEPTING  EU  CITIZENS  FREE..
